item.title: Zelensky meets with Trump in Paris as he tries to build support for Ukraine
item.description: The meeting marks the first time Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has joined President-elect Donald Trump in-person since the U.S. election.

item.title: Foreign leaders criticized Trump. Now they’re courting him.
item.description: The president-elect is in Paris on Saturday not as a punchline but as a guest of honor for the reopening of Notre Dame, the world-famous cathedral who...

item.title: Cabinet picks used to falter over far milder questionable conduct
item.description: Past nominees failed or withdrew over unpaid taxes or minor drug use from years ago. Today’s choices face more serious allegations.

item.title: Trump hesitates to personally lobby for endangered Cabinet picks
item.description: The president-elect has not yet personally lobbied hard for his choices, limiting his exposure if they are not confirmed. Some allies fear he’ll be we...

item.title: Supreme Court term-limits amendment proposed by Sens. Manchin, Welch
item.description: The long-shot proposal by Sen. Peter Welch (D-Vermont) and outgoing Sen. Joe Manchin III (I-West Virginia) would impose 18-year term limits on new jus...
